messages.message:
*Announcement: Vision Reasoning Fields Feature Now Available for Internal Testing in Build!* :sparkles: 

We’re excited to announce that a new feature—*Vision Reasoning Fields in Build*—is now available for internal testing on the AIHub sandbox (https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/). To start testing, please enable the internal feature flag `enable vision reasoning fields in Build projects.`

*Key Details:*

*Current Implementation & Limitations*

	•	*Page Image Limitation*: At most *3 page images* are processed for each document.
• 	•	*Shortdoc Pipeline*: Sends all available images for documents up to 3 pages.
• 	•	*Longdoc Pipeline*: Selects the first 3 pages based on the textual similarity of the top-6 chunks with the visual prompt. Each chunk corresponds to a specific page.
	•	*Visuals Only*: Currently, only visual information (images) is sent without any OCRed text.

_Not Yet Supported:_
	•	*Confidence Estimates*: Currently, no confidence scores are generated.
	•	*Provenance*: There is no support for provenance tracking at this stage.

*Feedback Request* :machine-learning: 
We’d love to hear your feedback on this feature! Please share your insights, especially in cases where the current fields don’t perform as expected (e.g., failures due to OCR issues or reliance on visual evidence) by replying to this thread!

Happy testing! :checkered_flag:
Can someone invite me to the org? Just signed up with <mailto:david.lee+sandbox-internal@instabase.com|david.lee+sandbox-internal@instabase.com>
Can I also be added too? <mailto:leila.tan+sandbox@instabase.com|leila.tan+sandbox@instabase.com>
